name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the "Minnan Wolf Reversal" incident broke out, almost all Taiwanese Internet celebrities on Douyin in China have become the target of doubts from netizens.
Among them, "Mai Gou 886" even released several clarification videos in one day. Netizens said: "Dog brother is obviously panicking"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens sent private messages to the Farmers' Daily, asking whether it really thought about farmers?
Some netizens were blocked by the Farmers' Daily for this reason.
Currently, the Farmers' Daily has enabled the "only allow fans to comment" function.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 3 (Released) Inner Mongolia. Late at night, senior high school students were still studying. One student slumped on the floor, staring at the ceiling in a daze.
December 2, Hefei, Anhui. At 12:30 in the morning, the child hadn't finished his homework yet, and he broke down crying anxiously. His mother comforted him: 'Hurry up, it's okay if you don't finish it.'
Netizens replied: Only by letting go of yourself can you get ashore.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Going home"
On December 8, with the fall of the Assad regime, thousands of Syrian refugees are returning to their homeland.
This caused congestion on the border between Türkiye and Syria.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a Kremlin source, Assad and his family have arrived in Moscow, and Russia has provided them with asylum for humanitarian reasons, according to Russia's TASS news agency.
"Russia has always advocated a political solution to the Syrian crisis. We insist on resuming UN-mediated negotiations," the source said.
"Russian officials are in contact with representatives of the Syrian armed opposition, and the opposition leaders have guaranteed the security of Russia's military bases and diplomatic missions on Syrian territory," the source added.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
December 7, Guangzhou. A suicide note suspected to be from a civil servant
The letter said that he used to have great faith that the Party would lead him to a good life. But he was completely disillusioned during the epidemic. Now at the end of the year, he is still owed half a year's salary, and he is getting more and more scared. He has worked hard for a long time. He studied hard for the college entrance examination in order to live a good life, but now he still has nothing. Is such a future worth looking forward to? Is there still a future in life?
In the end, he said, "Xi Jinping, listen to me, this life is lost in your tyranny, and my blood is stained in your hands, Xi Jinping."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 8, Guangzhou Metro suddenly strengthened security checks, adopting stricter security checks than airports. After passing the metal detector, you have to manually scan and recheck. Each person is checked, and power banks with more than 20,000 mAh are not allowed. Tissues must also be taken out for inspection.
Because the incident happened suddenly, there were long queues in the subway station. At some stations, the queues waiting for security checks were even as long as 100 meters. Some people waited for more than half an hour before getting on the subway.
There were people outside the station, but only a few people in the carriage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 8, Nan Fang Daily published an article saying that Guangzhou Metro will implement stricter security checks, reminding everyone to reserve extra time. Since the reminder was issued late last night, it may indicate that this enhanced security check mode will become normalized.
Some netizens commented: Terrorists now don’t have to worry about how to pass the security check, and the people queuing at the door are better targets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, a single mother posted a video saying that she is 37 years old and has no relatives. Now her child is sick, so she can't go to work and has to take care of the child at home. She has no other choice because of the pressure of life. "If you want to sleep with me, call me and give me some money."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 8, Hebei. An employee of the State Power Investment Corporation posted a video saying that he was unfairly punished by the party organization of his unit, and the upper level refused to accept his legitimate appeal. He was suppressed and lost his job because of this, so he decided to quit the party organization.
Netizens congratulated him in the comment area for abandoning the dark and joining the light: "Welcome to return to the people's team"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangzhou Metro still strengthens security checks on working days today, long queues
Some netizens said before that the security check is related to the Guangzhou Marathon, but the Guangzhou Marathon ended yesterday, and the subway is still strengthening security checks today.
Some netizens said that it was because the provincial department sent people to conduct unannounced security checks with knives, and no knives were found at the Guangzhou-Huozhou subway station.
A Guangzhou Metro security inspector complained that now if a bag is missed, 300 yuan of salary will be deducted, which is equivalent to working for two days in vain, and the security inspection company will also be fined.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, CCTV 4, the Chinese International Channel of China Central Television, misspelled the English word BREAKING in the opening credits of a breaking news program.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Recently, a woman with a baby was trapped in life and recorded a video in front of her child to receive customers.
According to the woman: She is 37 years old this year, her child is sick and needs someone to take care of him, and she can't afford to send him to a nursery, so she can't work. The child has no father, and the woman has no relatives, so she can only receive customers. The woman cried halfway through the video.
Some netizens made a joke as shown in Figure 2, hoping that the woman can get help from Peng Liyuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Raghid Al-Tatari, a former Syrian Air Force pilot, was sentenced to prison in 1981 after he refused to bomb Hama. He was released from Saydnaya prison on the 8th after 43 years in prison. He was 27 when he was imprisoned and is now 70.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: All the songs of the former Taiwanese patriotic musician Minnan Wolf who defected recently have been removed from all Chinese platforms
